official_title: Resolved, That the following-named Member be, and is hereby elected a Member of the following committee of the House of Representatives:  Elwood Hillis of Indiana:  Committee on Armed Services.

summary.text: Provides for the election of Elwood Hillis of Indiana to the Committee on Armed Services.

titles.title: Resolved, That the following-named Member be, and is hereby elected a Member of the following committee of the House of Representatives:  Elwood Hillis of Indiana:  Committee on Armed Services.
